animeDescription: Deep in the forests of Finland live the little people, or Tontus, the elves who work all year round to keep Joulupukki (Santa Claus) supplied with toys for Christmas Eve.  (Source: ANN)
animeVoices: ['Tomita, Kousei', 'Tsuru, Hiromi', 'Horikawa, Ryo', 'Tatsuta, Naoki', 'Suzuoki, Hirotaka', 'Tanaka, Mayumi', 'Shimaka, Yuu']
